title: Experience card
data:
{{Obsolete}} The Experience card makes the player more [[Experience|experienced]], both for levels and skills. If the player is below level 27, the level gain occurs as follows: *Power level 0-1: Gain power * 100 experience points towards the next level, but never enough to gain more than one level. *Power level 2: Gain a level. The player also receives experience for skill advancement: 200 + power * 50 experience points, up to a maximum of 20k additional XP. ==History== The Experience card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] before it was removed in [[0.15]]. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.11]] ![[0.12]] ![[0.13]] ![[0.14]] |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of changes|Changes]]
